actions.text: On agreeing to the Larson (CT) amendment (A065) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Larson (CT) amendment (A065) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A065) offered by Mr. Larson (CT).

description: An amendment numbered 71 printed in House Report 115-830 to provide funding within the Department of the Treasury, Departmental Office towards a study, led by Treasury with the participation of relevant regulators, to examine the financial impact of the mineral pyrrhotite in concrete home foundations. The study shall provide recommendations on regulatory and legislative actions needed to help mitigate impact on banks, mortgage lenders, tax revenues, and homeowners.
